TEXT.TITLE: HOG AND CATTLE SLAUGHTER GUESSTIMATES
TEXT.BODY: Chicago Mercantile Exchange floor traders and commission house representatives are guesstimating today's hog slaughter at about 275,000 to 285,000 head versus 283,000 week ago and 312,000 a year ago. Cattle slaughter is guesstimated at about 125,000 to 128,000 head versus 124,000 week ago and 136,000 a year ago. Reuter
